description: First impression is very good!
Many features, stable and Nextcloud support.

Takes a lot of inspiration from macOS' Things, something I love since is my favorite to-do list app. Lacks only one feature from it and that's start dates. It has due dates but not start dates, which I need for my workflow (start dates is one of the reasons why I like Things). Only with that it would be perfect for me!
summary: Nearly perfect, lacks one thing for me

description: The app has very useful design.

Really useful and simple to-do app that just works. It is reminiscent of Apple Reminders but it has its own features. It is nice that all data is stored locally (this is not something that you see a lot nowadays).
Very nice planning app

Planify is the best to-do list app I've used on any platform.

The offline mode is excellent, and the synchronization with Todoist is superb. I have dozens of different to-do lists, and it handles them all with ease without losing or duplicating data. It's easy to add notes and descriptions, set due dates, assign flags, and add reminders. But, if you only need to add a quick item, these other options don't get in your way.

The app is full of great little touches, from the way the sidebar hides itself when it's not needed, to the way it gives you a pie chart for your lists so you know how far along you are in completing them. If you use GNOME, and you have to-do lists, this app is a no-brainer!
summary: The best to-do app on any platform!

description: I like the minimalistic looks of the app, and nice looking dark theme. Makes planning a breeze. No signup needed.
summary: Great todo app with easy interface

description: This is a fantastic software with a clean interface
The app is original with its design, and contains much anitmations making it very immersive.
Super excited I found this app. It does everything I need it to do.

This is an excellent way to integrate Todoist into your workflow. Users can create unlimited projects with Planify as opposed to Todoist which limits you to four. 

There is even a way to create a custom shortcut to add a task from anywhere without having to leave the app you are in. 

Great job!
summary: 5 stars, great Todoist integration, worth a look

description: Between full complex interfaces and simplistic todo lists, Planify fills my needs perfectly providing a simple enough UI that dosen't scares me away.
UI look like fantastic. GTK is stunning with good hands. I will start to use GTK, if they improve their feature compatibility with old GTK versions.

Simple and elegant to-do list app for Linux. It is a great choice for anyone.
it has all the features you need to keep track of your tasks!

The Todoist syncing is great, but it is missing a really nice feature the official app has: natural language due date detection. That would bring it down to 3 to 4 stars, but the its resource usage is insane! This is a relatively static app that uses upwards of 50% of each CPU core. I can't help but be a bit suspicious about what it's doing in the background. Will definitely be uninstalling.
summary: Functional, but missing some features and a huge resource hog

description: Used just for 10 min, and find 3 bugs. (SEGKILL after changing task position to top and create task. Process time usage more than 40% after startup option switch to ON. Can't move task with subtask to another project). Bad product.

This is an amazing tool and will be very useful for many. 

The only thing missing is a "Report". How can I go back and see the work that i've done? I can't see it on the calendar. So what happens to all the completed tasks?
summary: Perfect in so many ways but is missing one feature

description: App crashes when I press "a" to create a new task.
I've been using this app since day one. It is simply awesome, well designed and useful. Consider buying the developer a coffee, this is top nothc app.
Esta muy buena para tener registradas mis tareas. Me gustaria saber como integrar a nextcloud.
Sin duda alguna mi app favorita, hermosos sideño, grandes funcionalidades y todo super ordenado, recomendado.
summary: La mejor app para gestionar tareas en Linux

description: Best Todo App Ever
Искал красивый и удобный список дел и данный подходит по всем параметрам

при перетаскивании задач для изменения порядка зависает программа и нужно принудительно закрывать, а после открытия в списке задач пишет что кол-во нужное есть, но не отображает (как локально так и с todoist account, синхронизация не помогает)

кнопка удаления проекта из меню самого проектов не работает

красивый и удобный интерфейс, напишите мне когда пофиксите, с удовольствием продолжу использование

сейчас к сожалению не отображает часть задач, которые есть(((
summary: задумка хорошая, очень удобно, но нужно доделать

description: Винегрет, компот и сборная солянка
